attributes.action: recognise that there is a maximum residential population for Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government needs to recognise that Britain is a small island and as such cannot continue increasing the population through immigration. Whilst there are times immigration may be healthy there are also times when if not checked serious problems will arise. It would not be wrong or unfair if the British people said enough is enough, the Country is full up we need a UK maximum residential quota.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
